content:
Ukrainian defenders destroyed the Russian reconnaissance UAV "Orlan-10" in the eastern direction.

This was reported

"Excellent work of calculation of the SAC of the Arrow-10 one of the departments of the Land Forces,"-the message reads.

On the eve of Ukrainian air defense forces over the Black Sea wateringknocked downRussian Forpost drone. This is one of the most expensive UAVs of the Russians.

As reported by the Armyinform, during March 2024 the units of air defense of the Land Forces of the Armed Forces of UkraineDestroyed326 air intelligence and enemy attack.
title: In the eastern direction, the Russian reconnaissance UAV "Orlan-10" was destroyed
description: This was reported by the commander of the Land Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine Lieutenant General Alexander ...
author: Army Inform
